interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Conair Quick Twist; Bonus Pack Review Date: 2015/11/11 Store: Conair Product Description: ['Create quick, fun, styles with the Conair Quick Twist Bonus Pack. The Quick Twist Bonus Pack makes it easy to create beautiful, colorful twisty braids in seconds. Get creative and get your twist on! The Quick Twist allows you to create perfect braids in just 3 easy steps. First, push up the button to raise the hair clasp. Insert end of hair strand under and release button. Repeat on either side. Pull strands away from head and slide switch up to rotate twists. Lastly, rotate by hand, in the direction of the arrow on the styler, to create a perfect twisty braid. Twist it all together by adding ribbons, beads and elastics for totally twisted one-of-a-kind styles you create yourself. The Quick Twist Bonus includes 40 Scunci anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips, 2 silky threads, 10 large hair clips, 1 strand of pearls, 1 sequin ribbon, 1 Conair Wet Dry Detangling Brush, 1 Conair Section and Style Comb, 2 Scunci Silicone Headbands, 4 Scunci Solid Knotted Ponytailers and 4 Scunci Animal Print Knotted Ponytailers. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).'] Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 4 x 9.88 inches; 13.86 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CD205TV', 'UPC': '074108332424', 'Manufacturer': 'Conair'} Review Text: Pros:-
1)It makes twists of hair in braids that are cool, beautiful & trendy.
2) It is good for creating hair patterns for parties and special occasions.
3) The kit includes 40 anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips.
4) The product runs with 2 AA batteries that is not included in the package.
Cons:-
One has to twist it by hand for 2 stranded twists. Review Title: Works ok.. Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Conair Quick Twist; Bonus Pack Conair ['Create quick, fun, styles with the Conair Quick Twist Bonus Pack. The Quick Twist Bonus Pack makes it easy to create beautiful, colorful twisty braids in seconds. Get creative and get your twist on! The Quick Twist allows you to create perfect braids in just 3 easy steps. First, push up the button to raise the hair clasp. Insert end of hair strand under and release button. Repeat on either side. Pull strands away from head and slide switch up to rotate twists. Lastly, rotate by hand, in the direction of the arrow on the styler, to create a perfect twisty braid. Twist it all together by adding ribbons, beads and elastics for totally twisted one-of-a-kind styles you create yourself. The Quick Twist Bonus includes 40 Scunci anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips, 2 silky threads, 10 large hair clips, 1 strand of pearls, 1 sequin ribbon, 1 Conair Wet Dry Detangling Brush, 1 Conair Section and Style Comb, 2 Scunci Silicone Headbands, 4 Scunci Solid Knotted Ponytailers and 4 Scunci Animal Print Knotted Ponytailers. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).'] {'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 4 x 9.88 inches; 13.86 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CD205TV', 'UPC': '074108332424', 'Manufacturer': 'Conair'} Pros:-
1)It makes twists of hair in braids that are cool, beautiful & trendy.
2) It is good for creating hair patterns for parties and special occasions.
3) The kit includes 40 anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips.
4) The product runs with 2 AA batteries that is not included in the package.
Cons:-
One has to twist it by hand for 2 stranded twists. Works ok..
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Strong focus on hair styling, emphasizing creativity and trendiness in hair designs, particularly for special occasions and parties.
  
- **Product Preferences:** Prefers hair tools that offer versatility in creating various styles (twists, braids) and values included accessories that enhance the overall experience (elastics, ribbons, clips).

- **Usage Context:** Likely utilizes hair styling tools for events, suggesting a preference for products that facilitate quick and effective results.

- **Performance Expectation:** Desires reasonable effectiveness in hair styling tools; however, indicates some dissatisfaction with functionality, suggesting a balance between performance and ease of use is important.

- **Ratings Insight:** Averages ratings around 3.0; showcases a tendency towards moderate satisfaction, indicating awareness of product limitations while appreciating their potential.

- **User Engagement Style:** Engages thoughtfully with products, balancing pros and cons while highlighting specific attributes; values practicality and aesthetics in hair styling tools. 

This profile aligns with trends in hair styling preferences, focusing on creativity, convenience, and the ability to achieve polished looks efficiently.
